H0.text: The 2012 best selling book 'My Animals and Other Family' is written by whom. Jilly Cooper

H1.text: The 2012 best selling book 'My Animals and Other Family' is written by whom. Gerald Durrell

H2.text: The 2012 best selling book 'My Animals and Other Family' is written by whom. James Herriot

H3.text: The 2012 best selling book 'My Animals and Other Family' is written by whom. Clare Balding

A4.text: My Family and Other Animals was published in October 1956

A6.text: She signed a deal with Viking Press to write an autobiography entitled My Animals and Other Family, which was published in September 2012.

A7.text: Her memoir My Animals and Other Family, which documents her life growing up in a racing yard, won the National Book Award for 'Autobiography of the Year' in 2012.
